valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 27 Aug 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 28 Aug 2025
general_synopsis: Low 250 miles west of Bailey 965 expected 100 miles west Rockall 985 by 1800 Wednesday. High Norwegian Sea 1013, slow-moving with little change
